sentences: Kesk- ja L천una-Ameerika hiiglamadu, kes surmab oma ohvri k채gistades.
context: The Estonian word 'ohvri' is the partitive form of 'ohver' (victim/prey/sacrifice). It refers to an animal or person that becomes prey, victim, or sacrifice. In the context of boa constrictors given in the dictionary definition, it specifically means the prey animal that gets killed by constriction.
